admin:
Route::get('comment', 'CommentController@list')->name('admin.commentList')->middleware(['permissions:CommentList']);    //评论列表
            Route::get('comment/{id}', 'CommentController@detail')->name('admin.commentDetail')->middleware(['permissions:CommentDetail']);    //评论详情
            Route::post('comment', 'CommentController@create')->name('admin.commentCreate')->middleware(['permissions:CommentCreate']);    //创建评论
            Route::post('comment/{id}', 'CommentController@edit')->name('admin.commentEdit')->middleware(['permissions:CommentEdit']);    //保存评论
            Route::post('comment/destroy/{id}', 'CommentController@destroy')->name('admin.commentDestroy')->middleware(['permissions:CommentDestroy']);    //删除评论
app:
Route::get('comment/detail/{id}', 'CommentController@detail')->name('admin.commentDetail');    //获取需要评价的商品列表
            Route::post('comment/{id}', 'CommentController@create')->name('admin.commentCreate');    //评价
routeLangAdmin:
'commentList'=>'评论列表',
        'commentDetail'=>'评论详情',
        'commentCreate'=>'创建评论',
        'commentEdit'=>'保存评论',
        'commentDestroy'=>'删除评论',
routeLangClient:
'commentDetail'=>'需要评价的商品列表',
        'commentCreate'=>'评价',
        'commentGood'=>'商品评价列表',
